name: Moonglow
long_description:
Moonglow makes it easy to run machine learning experiments on powerful GPUs in the cloud. 

Usually, setting up remote GPUs involves complicated and time-consuming DevOps. But with Moonglow, you can keep working in the familiar Jupyter notebook on your own computer. When you're ready to use more computing power, you just click a button to switch from your local machine to a GPU on your preferred cloud compute provider.

Sign up at moonglow.ai!
one_liner: Run local Jupyter notebooks on your cloud compute
